summary: This lively documentary explores the rise and fall of physical media and its effect on Independent and cult films. Ranging from the origin of home movies through the video store era, it's ... See full summary Â»
cast: Mike Aransky|Alan Bagh|Troy Bernier|John Bloom|Dick Boland|Ron Bonk|Carmine Capobianco|Juliette Danielle|Chris Ferry|Nicola Fiore|Matt Ford|Mark Frazer|Jonathan Gorman|Philip Guerette|Phil Hall|Lloyd Kaufman|David Leute|Whitney Moore|Ellen Muth|James Nguyen|Kenneth Powell|Nick Prueher|Kyle Rappaport|Deborah Reed|James Richardson|Debbie Rochon|David Royal|Josh Schafer|Greg Sestero|Bruce Seymour|Thomas Edward Seymour|Eric Swain|Girard Tecson|Jason West
director: Directors: Kenneth Powell (co-director), Thomas Edward Seymour (co-director)
title: VHS Massacre
